title: VOID OF VISION Cancels All North American Tour Dates: "We Ask You To Respect Our Privacy At This Time"
description: Here's hoping everything turns out alright.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 2 hours ago
excerpt: Here's hoping everything turns out alright.
text: Void Of Vision released their new record What I'll Leave Behind on September 20 and had a whole slew of North American tour dates lined up in support of it. Unfortunately the band has had to cancel all those dates over what they're calling "unexpected circumstances within our camp." Here's hoping everything turns out alright for everyone in Void Of Vision and they can return to the road as soon as possible. If you're unfamiliar with Void Of Vision, check out the What I'll Leave Behind single "Blood For Blood" below and get the record here. "To our North American fans & friends," wrote Void Of Vision. "We regret to inform you that Void Of Vision will no longer be performing our upcoming dates throughout this November/December including all headline dates & support dates w/ The Ghost Inside. "After careful consideration following unexpected circumstances within our camp the past month, we believe the best decision for all involved was to withdraw. Due to the personal nature of this decision, we ask you to respect our privacy at this time. "We apologize for any inconvenience caused. All ticket purchases for our headline dates will be refunded to point of purchase. Thank you for your ongoing support and understanding. "– Jack, James, Mitch & George" Want More Metal? html:
Void Of Vision released their new record What I'll Leave Behind on September 20 and had a whole slew of North American tour dates lined up in support of it. Unfortunately the band has had to cancel all those dates over what they're calling "unexpected circumstances within our camp."

Here's hoping everything turns out alright for everyone in Void Of Vision and they can return to the road as soon as possible. If you're unfamiliar with Void Of Vision, check out the What I'll Leave Behind single "Blood For Blood" below and get the record here.

"To our North American fans & friends," wrote Void Of Vision. "We regret to inform you that Void Of Vision will no longer be performing our upcoming dates throughout this November/December including all headline dates & support dates w/ The Ghost Inside.

"After careful consideration following unexpected circumstances within our camp the past month, we believe the best decision for all involved was to withdraw. Due to the personal nature of this decision, we ask you to respect our privacy at this time.

"We apologize for any inconvenience caused. All ticket purchases for our headline dates will be refunded to point of purchase. Thank you for your ongoing support and understanding.

"– Jack, James, Mitch & George"
